scenes.background: Monica leans forward, tapping her fingers on the table.
scenes.description: So, are we all on the same page about sticking to the plan?

options.text: I think we should stay flexible and adjust if needed.
options.analysis: You highlighted the importance of flexibility, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: Yes, sticking to the plan is the best way forward.
options.analysis: You supported the decision to stick to the plan, showing strong motivation but a lack of emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Let's review our objectives to ensure this aligns with our goals.
options.analysis: You suggested aligning actions with goals, showing good emotional perception and empathy.
